headers.subject: [HUDSON] Lucene-Solr-tests-only-trunk - Build # 6207 - Still Failing
headers.received: from nike.apache.org (HELO nike.apache.org) (192.87.106.230) by apache.org (qpsmtpd/0.29) with ESMTP; Mon, 21 Mar 2011 23:09:49 +0000
from [140.211.11.8] (HELO aegis.apache.org) (140.211.11.8) by apache.org (qpsmtpd/0.29) with ESMTP; Mon, 21 Mar 2011 23:09:46 +0000
